plot: A satire of media voyeurism, it follows a man who has invited a TV crew to broadcast his suicide. But what is the best way for him to die? Maybe the focus group watching on the internet will decide.
title: Exposure
plot_es: A satire of media voyeurism, it follows a man who has invited a TV crew to broadcast his suicide. But what is the best way for him to die? Maybe the focus group watching on the internet will decide.
plot_en: A satire of media voyeurism, it follows a man who has invited a TV crew to broadcast his suicide. But what is the best way for him to die? Maybe the focus group watching on the internet will decide.
